p: The potential health benefits of ω-FAs consumption are related to a wide range of pathologies, including cardiovascular disease (CVD), infant neurodevelopment, cancer, Alzheimer’s disease, cognitive function, rheumatoid arthritis, depression, attention deficit hyperactivity disorder (ADHD), and some eyes conditions like age-related macular degeneration, and dry eyes [ 10, 11, 27, 28, 29, 30, 31, 32, 33, 34].
